exam_details.type: Coal Mines Regulations, 1957/2017 / Metalliferous Mines Regulations, 1961
exam_details.post: Manager / Assistant Manager/ Assistant Manager-Under Manager/Surveyor / Overman/ Mining Sirdar

name: ADVERTISEMENT FOR THE POST OF DIRECTOR/FINANCE

details.Job Description: Applications are invited for the post of Director/Finance in Punjab State Power Corporation Limited (PSPCL) at Patiala in HAG Scale of Rs.182200-224100.
details.Qualification Requirements: Basic Chartered Accountant or Cost Accountant (ICWA). Age: Minimum age 50 years at the time of appointment.
details.Experience Requirements: The person should have worked for atleast twenty five (25) years, and worked in a senior position in Finance/Accounts with the rank equivalent to CE/General Manager Accounts for atleast one year or 5 years of experience as CAO in a company having an annual turnover of not less than Rs.500 Crore,
